Imagery Description: (a) HalfNon Sepcifieddraped woman seated on klismos, with mirror in r. hand and dish in l., facing Eros, (b) nude youth, with drapery over both arms, holding up mirror in r. hand, facing draped woman holding mirror.
Additional Notes: Lid: (a) panther, (b) bird with black and white striped wings and tail. The palmettes below the handles are in added white.
